alert.note: Alert for Hopkins; Hunt; Rains; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 11:27AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Hunt, northwestern Van Zandt, Hopkins and Rains Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1127 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Greenville Club Lake, or 9 miles southeast of Greenville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Sulphur Springs, Wills Point, Grand Saline, West Tawakoni, Edgewood, Quinlan, Emory, East Tawakoni, Point, Cumby, Como, Campbell, Hawk Cove, Fruitvale, Lake Tawakoni, Greenville Club Lake, Lake Tawakoni State Park, Lake Sulphur Springs and Greenville City Lakes. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 87 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
